description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2014-2017. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
Extent to which legal frameworks are in place for conservation, sustainable use, and access and benefit sharing of natural resources, biodiversity and ecosystems
Extent to which policy frameworks are in place for conservation, sustainable use, and access and benefit sharing of natural resources, biodiversity and ecosystems
Extent to which institutional frameworks are in place for conservation, sustainable use, and access and benefit sharing of natural resources, biodiversity and ecosystems
Extent to which capacities to implement national and local plans for Integrated Water Resources Management have improved
Extent to which capacities to protect and restore the health, productivity and resilience of oceans and marine ecosystems, have improved

title.narrative: KI Enhancing National Food Security in the context of CC

description.narrative: This is the PPG Phase of Kiribati Food Security Project which is being designed to build the adaptive capacity of vulnerable Kiribati communities to ensure food security under conditions of climate change.

Enhancing national food security in the context of global climate change. A project funded by the Least Developed Countries Fund (LDCF).

title.narrative: Enhancing natinal food security in the context of global CC- Kiribati

description.narrative: The project objective is to build the adaptive capacity of vulnerable Kiribati communities to ensure food security under conditions of climate change. The Least Developed Countries Fund investment will support the realization of two components and related activities. Both components will be closely aligned so that national and site based activities are designed to build synergies, increase awareness, and generate much more informed and strategic use of natural resources so that ecosystem integrity is able to continue to function as the foundation of food security needs.
capital of a political entity
